attributes.action: investigate the corruption which has infiltrated our national sport of football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events have shown that corruption and bribery are ripe in our beloved national game of football.  I petition the prime minister to start a full investigation into the F.A. and Manchester United on charges of corruption and bringing the game into dispute.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
